        void init(String configPrefix)
   throws MaryConfigurationException
        Initialise this scost cost function by reading the appropriate settings from the MaryProperties using the given configPrefix.
        Parameters:
        configPrefix - the prefix for the (voice-specific) config entries to use when looking up files to load.
